```{r packages}
library(car)
library(pbkrtest)
library(lmerTest)
library(lme4)
library(optimx)
library(performance)
library(emmeans)

```
```{r data}

df <- read.csv('C:/Users/mvmigem/Documents/data/project_1/compiled_dataframes/seq4_late.csv')


df <- subset(df, !subject %in% c(3, 14, 20))

```
```{r data}
df$subject <- as.factor(df$subject)
df$attention <- as.factor(df$attention)


options(contrasts = c("contr.sum", "contr.poly"))

```

## the full model
```{r}
# tailored_amp ultra_amp general_amp, baseline_corrected

f1 <- y ~ 1 + attention +
               (1 | subject)


fit.late <- lmer(f1,data = df, control = lmerControl(optimizer ='optimx', optCtrl=list(method='L-BFGS-B')))

summary(fit.late)

contrasts(df$attention)

confint()
```
